page.title: 19MELANIE AGED 11
page.content: I LIKE WHITSOME BECAUSE IT IS A NICE LITTLE VILAGE AND NOT TOO OVER - CROWDED. ONE THING IS THAT IF THE SCHOOL CLOSED DOWN IT WOULD LOSE ITS ATMOSPHERE AND PEOPLE WOULDN'T MOVE HERE BECAUSE THERE WOULD BE NO SCHOOL TO GO TO. I LIKE LIVING IN WHITSOME BECAUSE I USED TO LIVE IN THE TOWN AND I HAVE NOTICED A GREAT DEAL OF DIFFERENCE AND WHITSOME IS SO QUIET COMPARED WITH THE NOISY TOWN. IT WOULD BE BETTER AS WELL IF YOUNGER COUPLES WITH CHILDREN MOVED IN SO THEN THE SCHOOL MIGHT HAVE A BETTER CHANCE OF STAYING OPEN.
